about_the_game:
Project Badlight is a medieval first-person roguelike with directional melee combat. Fight your way through procedurally-generated dungeons alone, or with a party of up to 4 adventurers in an attempt to escape the prison. 

Features: 

  • Put your skills to the test with randomly generated dungeon floors, perma-death, and no handholding.

  • Cooperate with 1-4 players via Online Co-Op.

  • Master a variety of different classes, ranging from the familiar Knight, Wizard, Healer, to the unique Marauder, Merchant, and Arcane Archer.

  • Conquer or be killed by surprises around every corner in a new dungeon every time you play.

  • Learn deep RPG systems and level up your skills and stats to become stronger.

  • Loot tons of items and riches that may be traded or crafted into better equipment.

  • Discover the secrets of the Prison, and find legendary artifacts to greatly increase your power.

  • Experience an active development team with an unwavering dedication to providing free updates and constantly improving the gameplay experience.

Project Badlight is a love-letter to fans of the medieval melee and roguelite genres.

content_descriptors.notes: In general, the combat is visceral and violent by nature. Players use bladed and blunt melee weapons to destroy a variety of different fictional monsters and creatures and there are blood effects to depict the player hitting them.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 with 3GB of video RAM or Radeon RX 580 with 4GB of video RAM or Intel Arc A380
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: 3.6 GHz Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX or Radeon RX5600 or Intel Arc A580 or above
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
